cFreedom6S3dofPointer Class Reference

cFreedom6S3dofPointer provides a cursor-like tool which is graphically rendered by a small sphere illustrating the tip of the device. The tools interacts with the enviornment by using the finger-proxy algorithm More...

#include <CFreedom6S3dofPointer.h>

Detailed Description

cFreedom6S3dofPointer provides a cursor-like tool which is graphically rendered by a small sphere illustrating the tip of the device. The tools interacts with the enviornment by using the finger-proxy algorithm
